name: Mascot's Affection
text: Your familiar can bond with many creatures.
prerequisites: Must have a familiar with the mascot archetype (see page 11).
benefit: The maximum number of team members your familiar can have increases by two.
text_zh: 你的魔宠能够与许多生物产生联系。
prerequisites_zh: 必须具有使用了吉祥物（Mascot）变体的魔宠。
benefit_zh: 你的魔宠的最高队伍成员数量增加2名。
